Erowid name: gabapentin
Category: PHARMS
Field: MainPage

                    Text: 
                    Follow @Erowid on Instagram!

Gabapentin



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

Neurontin

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Anticonvulsant; Tranquilizer

CHEMICAL NAME

1-(aminomethyl)cyclohexanacetic acid

DESCRIPTION

Gabapentin is prescribed -- usually in combination with other medications -- for the treatment of seizure disorders, though its anticonvulsant mechanism is not known. It is sometimes prescribed for the management of neuralgia (nerve pain) and has been prescribed off-label for the treatment of mood disorders, anxiety, and tardive dyskinesia (a neurological syndrome caused by the long-term use of neuroleptic drugs).

BASICS

EFFECTS

IMAGES

HEALTH

LAW

DOSE

CHEMISTRY

GENERAL INFORMATION #

Notes on the Medical Uses of Gabapentin

Neurontin for Detoxing from GHB Addiction

RELATED VAULTS #

EXPERIENCES #

The Loop, by ArUcAmXeLa93

                    Context: 
                    This section provides experiential reports on pregabalin (Lyrica), including user experiences such as singing, feelings of being a zombie, and personal motivations for use. It also lists off-site resources, including primary and secondary references like WebMD, Wikipedia, and medication FAQs, along with media coverage on misuse. This information supplements the main pharmacy entry on gabapentin, highlighting user experiences and external resources related to gabapentinoids.
